block_comment: This block manages the updating of the MCB_UODATAVALID_U signal. It listens for either a positive edge of the UI_CLK signal or a high logic level in the MCB_UODATAVALID signal. When the MCB_UODATAVALID signal is high, it sets the MCB_UODATAVALID_U flag to true to acknowledge data validity. Otherwise, it mirrors the state of MCB_UODATAVALID to MCB_UODATAVALID_U.
